variables.input:
timeseries sum(dt.kubernetes.nodes), by: {k8s.cluster.name}, interval: 1d
| fields k8s.cluster.name

0.title: Cluster Nodes
0.query: timeseries avg(dt.kubernetes.nodes), alias: nodes, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name,array($cluster_name))

1.title: Node Health (Condition Ready)
1.query: timeseries avg(dt.kubernetes.nodes), alias: nodes, by: {node_condition_ready}, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name,array($cluster_name))

3.title: Pods by Node
3.query: timeseries max(dt.kubernetes.node.pods), alias: pods, by: {k8s.node.name}, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name,array($cluster_name))

4.title: Running Pods
4.query:
timeseries max(dt.kubernetes.node.pods), alias: pods, by: {k8s.node.name}, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name,array($cluster_name)) AND pod_phase == "Running"
| summarize pods = sum(arrayLast(pods))

5.title: Succeeded Pods
5.query:
timeseries max(dt.kubernetes.node.pods), alias: pods, by: {k8s.node.name}, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name,array($cluster_name)) AND pod_phase == "Succeeded"
| summarize pods = sum(arrayLast(pods))

6.title: Pending Pods
6.query:
timeseries max(dt.kubernetes.node.pods), alias: pods, by: {k8s.node.name}, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name,array($cluster_name)) AND pod_phase == "Pending"
| summarize pods = sum(arrayLast(pods))

7.title: Failed Pods
7.query:
timeseries max(dt.kubernetes.node.pods), alias: pods, by: {k8s.node.name}, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name,array($cluster_name)) AND pod_phase == "Failed"
| summarize pods = sum(arrayLast(pods))

8.title: Cluster Allocatable CPU
8.query:
timeseries sum(dt.kubernetes.node.cpu_allocatable), alias: cpu, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name,array($cluster_name))
| fields cpu = arrayLast(cpu) / 1000

9.title: Cluster Requested CPU
9.query:
timeseries sum(dt.kubernetes.node.requests_cpu), alias: cpu, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name,array($cluster_name))
| fields cpu = arrayLast(cpu) / 1000

10.title: Cluster Allocatable Memory
10.query:
timeseries sum(dt.kubernetes.node.memory_allocatable), alias: memory, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name,array($cluster_name))
| fields memory = arrayLast(memory) * power(10,-9)

11.title: Cluster Requested Memory
11.query:
timeseries sum(dt.kubernetes.node.requests_memory), alias: memory, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name,array($cluster_name))
| fields memory = arrayLast(memory) * power(10,-9)

13.title: Node Allocatable CPU
13.query:
timeseries sum(dt.kubernetes.node.cpu_allocatable), alias: cpu, by: {k8s.node.name}, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name,array($cluster_name))
| fields cpu = arrayLast(cpu) / 1000, k8s.node.name

14.title: Node Requested CPU
14.query:
timeseries sum(dt.kubernetes.node.requests_cpu), alias: cpu, by: {k8s.node.name}, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name,array($cluster_name))
| fields cpu = arrayLast(cpu) / 1000, k8s.node.name

15.title: Node Allocatable Memory
15.query:
timeseries sum(dt.kubernetes.node.memory_allocatable), alias: memory, by: {k8s.node.name}, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name,array($cluster_name))
| fields memory = arrayLast(memory) * power(10,-9), k8s.node.name

16.title: Node Requested Memory
16.query:
timeseries sum(dt.kubernetes.node.requests_memory), alias: memory, by: {k8s.node.name}, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name,array($cluster_name))
| fields memory = arrayLast(memory) * power(10,-9), k8s.node.name

17.title: Node CPU Usage
17.query:
timeseries avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), alias: cpu, by: {dt.entity.host}
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.host 
  | filterOut isNull(clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster])
  | fieldsAdd k8s_cluster = clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster]
  | fields k8s_cluster, id, entity.name
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster 
    | filter entity.name == $cluster_name | fields id, entity.name]
    , sourceField: k8s_cluster, lookupField: id, prefix: "lookup_cluster."]
  , sourceField: dt.entity.host, lookupField: id, prefix: "lookup_host."
| filterOut isNull(lookup_host.lookup_cluster.entity.name)
| fieldsAdd node = lookup_host.entity.name
| fieldsRemove lookup_host.id, lookup_host.k8s_cluster, lookup_host.lookup_cluster.entity.name, lookup_host.lookup_cluster.id, dt.entity.host, lookup_host.entity.name

19.title: Node Memory Usage
19.query:
timeseries avg(dt.host.memory.usage), alias: mem, by: {dt.entity.host}
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.host 
  | filterOut isNull(clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster])
  | fieldsAdd k8s_cluster = clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster]
  | fields k8s_cluster, id, entity.name
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster 
    | filter entity.name == $cluster_name | fields id, entity.name]
    , sourceField: k8s_cluster, lookupField: id, prefix: "lookup_cluster."]
  , sourceField: dt.entity.host, lookupField: id, prefix: "lookup_host."
| filterOut isNull(lookup_host.lookup_cluster.entity.name)
| fieldsAdd node = lookup_host.entity.name
| fieldsRemove lookup_host.id, lookup_host.k8s_cluster, lookup_host.lookup_cluster.entity.name, lookup_host.lookup_cluster.id, dt.entity.host, lookup_host.entity.name

20.title: Node Disk Space Usage
20.query:
timeseries max(dt.host.disk.used.percent), alias: disk, by: {dt.entity.host}
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.host 
  | filterOut isNull(clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster])
  | fieldsAdd k8s_cluster = clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster]
  | fields k8s_cluster, id, entity.name
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster 
    | filter entity.name == $cluster_name | fields id, entity.name]
    , sourceField: k8s_cluster, lookupField: id, prefix: "lookup_cluster."]
  , sourceField: dt.entity.host, lookupField: id, prefix: "lookup_host."
| filterOut isNull(lookup_host.lookup_cluster.entity.name)
| fieldsAdd node = lookup_host.entity.name
| fieldsRemove lookup_host.id, lookup_host.k8s_cluster, lookup_host.lookup_cluster.entity.name, lookup_host.lookup_cluster.id, dt.entity.host, lookup_host.entity.name

21.title: Node Disk Utilization Time
21.query:
timeseries avg(dt.host.disk.util_time), alias: disk, by: {dt.entity.host}
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.host 
  | filterOut isNull(clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster])
  | fieldsAdd k8s_cluster = clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster]
  | fields k8s_cluster, id, entity.name
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster 
    | filter entity.name == $cluster_name | fields id, entity.name]
    , sourceField: k8s_cluster, lookupField: id, prefix: "lookup_cluster."]
  , sourceField: dt.entity.host, lookupField: id, prefix: "lookup_host."
| filterOut isNull(lookup_host.lookup_cluster.entity.name)
| fieldsAdd node = lookup_host.entity.name
| fieldsRemove lookup_host.id, lookup_host.k8s_cluster, lookup_host.lookup_cluster.entity.name, lookup_host.lookup_cluster.id, dt.entity.host, lookup_host.entity.name

23.title: Node Net Traffic In
23.query:
timeseries avg(dt.host.net.nic.traffic_in), alias: net, by: {dt.entity.host}
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.host 
  | filterOut isNull(clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster])
  | fieldsAdd k8s_cluster = clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster]
  | fields k8s_cluster, id, entity.name
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster 
    | filter entity.name == $cluster_name | fields id, entity.name]
    , sourceField: k8s_cluster, lookupField: id, prefix: "lookup_cluster."]
  , sourceField: dt.entity.host, lookupField: id, prefix: "lookup_host."
| filterOut isNull(lookup_host.lookup_cluster.entity.name)
| fieldsAdd node = lookup_host.entity.name
| fieldsRemove lookup_host.id, lookup_host.k8s_cluster, lookup_host.lookup_cluster.entity.name, lookup_host.lookup_cluster.id, dt.entity.host, lookup_host.entity.name

24.title: Node Net Traffic Out
24.query:
timeseries avg(dt.host.net.nic.traffic_out), alias: net, by: {dt.entity.host}
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.host 
  | filterOut isNull(clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster])
  | fieldsAdd k8s_cluster = clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster]
  | fields k8s_cluster, id, entity.name
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster 
    | filter entity.name == $cluster_name | fields id, entity.name]
    , sourceField: k8s_cluster, lookupField: id, prefix: "lookup_cluster."]
  , sourceField: dt.entity.host, lookupField: id, prefix: "lookup_host."
| filterOut isNull(lookup_host.lookup_cluster.entity.name)
| fieldsAdd node = lookup_host.entity.name
| fieldsRemove lookup_host.id, lookup_host.k8s_cluster, lookup_host.lookup_cluster.entity.name, lookup_host.lookup_cluster.id, dt.entity.host, lookup_host.entity.name

27.title: WARN and INFO Events

28.title: WARN Events by Object Kind
28.query:
fetch logs
| filter event.type == "K8S" AND matchesValue(dt.kubernetes.cluster.name,$cluster_name)
| filter status == "WARN"
| summarize events = count(), by: {dt.kubernetes.event.involved_object.kind, alias: object}

29.title: WARN Events by Node
29.query:
fetch logs
| filter event.type == "K8S" AND matchesValue(dt.kubernetes.cluster.name,$cluster_name)
| filter status == "WARN"
| summarize events = count(), by: {dt.kubernetes.node.name, alias: node}
| fields events = events + 0, node

30.title: WARN Events by Namespace
30.query:
fetch logs
| filter event.type == "K8S" AND matchesValue(dt.kubernetes.cluster.name,$cluster_name)
| filter status == "WARN"
| summarize events = count(), by: {k8s.namespace.name, alias: namespace}

31.title: Events by Category
